Package ohos.agp.components.element

Class ElementContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.components.element.Element
      • ohos.agp.components.element.ElementContainer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FrameAnimationElement, StateElement

    public class ElementContainer
extends Element
    A container class of Element that contains multiple Element objects.

    Only one Element object in the ElementContainer is valid. You can subclass this class to create an ElementContainer or directly use one of its child classes.

    Since:
    1

      • isStateful

        public boolean isStateful​()
        Checks whether the state of an Element object is changed based on the component state.
        Overrides:
        isStateful in class Element
        Returns:
        Returns true if the Element object state is changed; returns false otherwise.

      • selectElement

        public boolean selectElement​(int index)
        Selects an Element object to display according to a specified index.

        If the index does not have a matching Element object, the index is changed to -1, and Element is set to null.

        Parameters:
        index - Indicates the index of the selected element object to display.
        Returns:
        Returns true if another element object is selected; returns false if the same element object is selected.

      • getCurrentElement

        public Element getCurrentElement​()
        Obtains the Element object in use.
        Overrides:
        getCurrentElement in class Element
        Returns:
        Returns the Element object in use in normal cases; returns the child Element object in use if an ElementContainer is used.

        public ElementContainer.ElementState getElementState​()
        Obtains an ElementContainer.ElementState instance, which holds shared states of an Element object.
